code: @Test public void testPojoOk() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBody("direct:start", "Claus", String.class).     assertEquals("Claus Claus", out). }

@Test public void testPojoKabom() throws Exception {     try {         template.requestBody("direct:start", "Kabom", String.class).         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (CamelExecutionException e) {         MyEchoRuntimeException cause = assertIsInstanceOf(MyEchoRuntimeException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("Damn something went wrong", cause.getMessage()).     } }
